page.title: 15Hadley Infants and Nursery
page.content: The infant school was built in 1951 and,at the present time,has 149 pupils in its infant section and 59 in the nursery school. The present Head,Miss J.Madeley, confessed to us that although she enjoys her job very much, it was not one she had considered for herself,she had only applied after others had suggested she should. Children start on the nursery school just before their fourth birthday. Their schoolday is a varied one,with the emphasis on the child's involvement in a range of activities designed to develop their perception of their environment. The school was only last week the target of an attack of vandalism, something which is becoming all too common.
